title: [Vardar Hollow, Approach]
description: Framed on either side by white spruce, birch, and berry-laden wintergreen bushes, a sinuous road of tightly packed cobblestones winds toward a quaint pine lodge and accompanying resort in the near distance.  Smoke rises from their chimneys, peppering the air with the alluring odor of burning wood and resin.  Fresh snow glistens in silhouetted banks to either side of the walk, a testament to the regularity of maintenance on the roadway.
